Name: **Loc_ID**
Description: A unique identifier for this individual Localization event.

Name: **Spot_ID**
Description: A unique identifier for the bright DNA or RNA Spot with which this individual localization event is associated.

Name: **X**
Description: The sub-pixel X coordinate of this Localization event.

Name: **Y**
Description: The sub-pixel Y coordinate of this Localization event.

Name: **Z**
Description: The sub-pixel Z coordinate of this Localization event.

Name: **Fluor**
Description: the fluorescent channel in which this localization was detected
